price: 37. Wana ezali bokundoli тропа oyo azali na motema to azali koyoka mpe kornona.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكۡرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُۥ قَلۡبٌ أَوۡ أَلۡقَى ٱلسَّمۡعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika ladhik'rā liman kāna lahu qalbun aw alqā al-samʿa wahuwa shahīdun
